item.description: Add one part farmers' market, one helping of craft fair and a dash of carnival and you've got Washusett's annual Applefest. the perfect recipe for lots of fun! Soar over the beautiful foliage on the mountain's SkyRide, buy fresh apples and cider or compete in the popular pie-eating contest. Sounds fun let's go!
item.how_to_find_us: We will figure this out as we get closer to the event

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Wachusett Mountain Apple Fest
